description: Take your next family barbecue up a level with this charred barramundi topped with a Thai-inspired lime, chilli and coriander drizzle.
keywords: Barbecued Barramundi With Thai Green Dressing
name: Barbecued Barramundi With Thai Green Dressing Recipe | Woolworths

recipeInstructions.text: Combine fried shallot, chilli and remaining coriander leaves in a bowl. Arrange fish on a platter, drizzle over half the dressing and scatter over coriander mixture. Serve with remaining dressing and extra lime.
